Package in.co.rays.proj4.util

package in.co.rays.proj4.util
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DataUtility
    DataUtility class is used to convert data from one format to another.
    DataValidator
    DataValidator class is contains functions that perform input validations on the data entered by user in textbox.
    EmailBuilder
    Class that builds email messages for different scenarios like UserRegistration, ForgetPassword and ChangePassword.
    EmailMessage
    Contains email messages
    EmailUtility
    Utility class that performs sending mail operation.
    HTMLUtility
    HTMLUtility is used to process list for static preload and dynamic preload.
    JDBCDataSource
    JBCDataSource is used to create connections via combo pool data source.
    PropertyReader
    PropertyReader is used to read values from Resource Bundle in form of key-value
    ServletUtility
    ServletUtility class contains utility functions like requestDispatcher,sendRedirect.
